I'm going with the street-battle in 'Heat'. The one right after the robbery, where the police setup to 'blockades' on opposing sides of an avenue and Robert DeNiro, Val Kilmer, and Tom Sizemore have to battle like 30 cops with some sweet automatic weapons. (Btw, does anyone know what type of weapons those were?)
That was a good one; very exciting. Don't know what kind of weapons they were though.

 Open Range: the one in town.

Two spring to mind. 
 1. The gun kata fight at the end of Equilibrium
 2. The fight at the begining of the "newest" version of Romeo & Juliet. The rest of the movie slumps, but the cinematography on the opening scene is brilliant.
i have to second the fight from Equilibrium

And I third it.
 
 My second choice would be the fight the The Matrix, when Keanu and that woman enter a government building and try to free Morpheus.
The Gun fight at the OK Corral.............
